Hey guys,

 

any leads into the right direction would be awesome.

 

For my Plugin Navball Docking Alignment Indicator (Community Edition) I try to manipulate the IVA Navball and add a custom marker to it. It works perfectly fine for the Inflight Navball (The one you see on the map, EVA and flight) however the one in the IVA doesn't seem to be the navball gameobject I am interfering with for that. After some search on how other plugins manipulate IVA Screens they all refere to the InternalModules so I went ahaed and tried the same thing as I did for the normal Navball and talked to the  InternalNavBall gameobject however that's not what I want (for testing purposes I just simply tried to change the prograde marker color.. however it is not changing) so I guess the GameObject I am looking for is neither the NavBall nor  InternalNavBall.. Any Ideas which one the NavBall is that is rendered in IVA?
